!Angelic Vortex: The Angelic Vortex emits a faint light, and in the midst of the light an image appears. In the deepest part of a spacious area, a gigantic stone statue is visible. The statue has a human-like appearance and is in a seated position, as through it was behind held by some invisible force against its will. [npc_%objectId%_request_entrance|Go where the Angelic Vortex leads.]
